keyword: calories in a caesar chicken wrap
title: Calories in a Caesar Chicken Wrap
meta_description: Learn calories in a caesar chicken wrap, with full nutrition facts including protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for healthier options.
h1: Calories in a Caesar Chicken Wrap
assumptions: Grilled chicken breast, romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, parmesan cheese, flour tortilla; standard restaurant or fast-food portion (~300g total).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, portion size, and preparation method. Check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: A Caesar chicken wrap typically contains ~550 kcal and ~30 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Caesar chicken wrap?
faqs.a: Approximately 550 kcal for a standard wrap.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a Caesar chicken wrap?
faqs.a: About 30 g of protein from the grilled chicken.

faqs.q: Are Caesar chicken wraps high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically ~1200 mg due to dressing and cheese.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie Caesar chicken wrap?
faqs.a: Opt for low-fat dressing and skip cheese to reduce by ~100 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the carb breakdown in a Caesar chicken wrap?
faqs.a: Around 50 g carbs, mostly from the tortilla, with 3 g fiber.
